mapper.sql: bf_no AS bfNo, bf_name AS bfName, board_no AS boardNo, file_path AS filePath, file_originname AS fileOriginName, file_size AS fileSize
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO board_file ( board_no, bf_name, file_path, file_originname
) VALUES ( #{boardNo}, #{bfName}, #{filePath}, #{fileOriginName} )
